title: Suspect arrested after man dies from gunshot wound
content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. —
A 61-year-old man died Tuesday after he was shot in the head, authorities said.
Deputies responded Tuesday afternoon to reports of shots fired near Cynthia Loop Northwest and and Sgt. Pepper Court.
Police found 61-year-old Charles Ulery with a gunshot wound.
Rescue crews did not attempt lifesaving measures because of the gravity of the wound.
Police arrested 46-year-old John Bennett as a suspect in the shooting.
No other details have been released.
KOAT will provide updates as they become available.
